skills.skill: Basic Life Support for HealthCare Provider (BLS/HCP) Certification

duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide compassionate and skilled OB nursing care during labor and delivery.
Collaborate with the medical team to meet the needs of mother and baby, ensuring a safe and supportive environment.
Maintain BLS/HCP, ACLS, NRP, PALS, STABLE, and NCC-EFM certifications to provide high-quality care.
Actively participate in on-call duties and respond to the needs of patients and their families.
Contribute to the unit's performance and excellence in providing labor and delivery and postpartum care.

education_certification.credential: RN license in Idaho and Oregon within specified timelines.
